text:
Congratulations to @ucmerced for ranking in the top 25 best public universities and holding the No. 3 spot for social mobility in the United States! 

Read more: https://t.co/66VwBqws7D https://t.co/5U9MYSoF9x

Last month, I connected with the next generation of ag leaders at the Stanislaus County Fair Cattlemen's Dinner. Their passion and dedication are what the Valley needs to remain the country’s leading ag region. https://t.co/tIOLgh7mfI

Happy National App Challenge Day! 

Students in #CA13 can submit their original app for consideration at https://t.co/GMdebCyWEf until October 30 for a chance to be featured in the US Capitol. https://t.co/pGnjrpGCwm
September 15 to October 15 is Hispanic Heritage Month, a time to honor and celebrate the vibrant Hispanic community in the Central Valley and across the country! https://t.co/Evls1R6VhD

Need help with a federal agency? From stalled veterans' benefits to delayed Social Security checks and backlogged IRS returns, we're ready to assist with federal casework.

Come meet Team Gray near you this month! https://t.co/gjVYgTTAYE

Nearly half of the folks in CA-13 rely on Medicaid and are facing higher costs, extended wait times, and longer drives to the doctor.

I introduced a bill to reverse Medicaid cuts & extend tax credits to prevent price spikes for Valley families. Let’s get this done. https://t.co/7LxnKd7erj

On the 24th anniversary of the September 11 attacks, we honor the memories of those lost that day, as well as the sacrifice of all the first responders who ran towards danger and saved lives in the process. We will never forget. https://t.co/0AjHEPfMaY

TUNE IN THIS MORNING: I'll be leading my colleagues LIVE from the Capitol as we introduce the Protecting Health Care and Lowering Costs Act of 2025. 

Watch our livestream on Facebook starting at 7:30 AM PT/10:30 AM ET. https://t.co/JimIogKxNZ
There is no place for political violence in our country. I'm hoping for a full recovery for Mr. Kirk and for a return to decency and peace for the rest of us.

The Central Valley grows one in every four bites of food that Americans eat. This Hunger Action Month, I’m continuing my work to support the producers who put food on our tables and keep our families fed. https://t.co/SG3wQglzYM
Read more about our visit and my work to ensure our veterans have access to the care and benefits they deserve: https://t.co/50Gu0Pjgrq
Honored to greet Valley veterans and their guardians during their Honor Flight visit this morning. Thank you all for your service to our nation. https://t.co/RRKBE78zil

Vet shortages pose a serious threat to the livestock industry and the wellness of our animals. Proud to cosponsor the Rural Veterinary Workforce Act to provide relief from educational debt for vets and expand opportunities for the next generation. https://t.co/qULlSwXLlm

While in Modesto last month, I toured facilities at JS West, a family-run energy and livestock business. Their work keeps Valley homes and businesses running while supporting our region's economy. https://t.co/DW1ZgGCoZv

Do you have an idea for an original app? Submit an application for the Congressional App Challenge! 

For more information, visit https://t.co/GMdebCyoOH. Applications from CA-13 students are due by October 30, 2025! https://t.co/cpW7mNnv1j

To increase water storage in California, we need to get serious about cutting through the red tape that holds us back. Looking forward to working with my colleagues on the Natural Resources Committee to get it done. https://t.co/QAQx55qa71

Last month, I toured the new Calbee research & development site in Madera. 

The Valley is home to ag innovators, business leaders and the hardest working people in the country. Investments like Calbee’s will keep our region at the forefront of ag development! https://t.co/5rEc6kUw0N

Reliable water is vital for Valley families and industry. As we mark Groundwater Protection Day today, I’m continuing my work to increase funding for water storage projects across our region. https://t.co/ccbhycrG7i

Over Labor Day weekend, we honored the workers who power our economy. I'm especially thankful for the farmworkers who harvest our crops and put food on our table. 

Valley farmer Joe @DelBosqueFarms talks more about how farmworkers feed our nation: https://t.co/PMXGAE7aUe

Thank you to everyone who joined us for the grand opening of our new office in Merced last week. Great to see so many neighbors and share more about what I'm working on as your representative. https://t.co/qbaiYaiWXd

Read more from @TheMercedFOCUS:
https://t.co/6va0Dy5kba

Thousands of Valley families who rely on food assistance will see their benefits slashed just as kids go back to school thanks to the partisan budget bill.

The bill betrayed our working families. That's why I voted no. https://t.co/5bmSROIAJ5
Join us tomorrow for the grand opening of our new District Office in Merced! Hope to see you there. Call my team at (209) 226-6880 with questions. https://t.co/PdYSDxCzDA

When President Kennedy visited the Valley in 1962, we took a huge step toward expanded water storage for our state. Since then, under increasing red tape, progress has stalled. 

We must continue Kennedy’s efforts to improve Valley infrastructure.
Read my full op-ed here: https://t.co/gkJ8JuLS7a

To make sure the Central Valley remains one of the world's leading agricultural regions, we need to get serious about investing in water infrastructure. And we need to do it quickly.

More from my recent piece in the @sacbee_news: https://t.co/vIfXNRAb4g
It's Pistachio Week! We're celebrating the hardworking farmers who make the Central Valley one of the largest pistachio-producing regions in the world! https://t.co/lOhbkDuMap
Our veterans deserve more than rhetoric–they deserve results. Read more about yesterday's meeting and my recent work to lower costs for veterans here: https://t.co/sCbAfgmzed
Yesterday we hosted our summer Veterans Advisory Committee hearing. Thank you to the veterans, VSO representatives and advocates who came out to join us. https://t.co/fCqCKzcvYU
More information and a full list of mobile office hours: https://t.co/kucT1ERifx
Need help with Social Security checks? VA benefits delayed? Come meet Team Gray at our mobile office hours for federal casework support! https://t.co/GSdSfmzN7M
Read more about the Protecting Healthcare And Lowering Costs Act: https://t.co/etbjvipjJn

The partisan budget bill threatens health coverage for nearly 420,000 people in the Valley who rely on Medicaid. 

Unacceptable.

Yesterday I introduced a bill to restore full Medicaid funding and protect care for Valley families. https://t.co/8sH8mqf9xY
Read more: https://t.co/Bdb4dRY4dv

My bill to limit copays for veterans at VA health clinics passed with unanimous support out of the House @VetAffairsDems Committee this week, bringing us one step closer to having this important measure signed into law.

Next stop: the House Floor. https://t.co/uW7z9FsYaU

Congratulations to Madera Community College on a fantastic five years. The Valley wouldn't be where we are today without the job training and professional development opportunities MCC offers—I know the future is bright! https://t.co/Z5MXTk5dnb
Current law means water infrastructure projects take up to 15 years, if they're even finished at all. Our farmers can't wait. We need to reform our permitting process—now. https://t.co/422g4PCJ4r
More from @CalMatters: https://t.co/BBq1tuQrNa

Migrant farmworkers are essential to our state's economy. Defunding educational programs for their kids is not only cruel, but incredibly dangerous for the ag community that relies on them. https://t.co/FPJFcuO1nE
Watch my full remarks here: https://t.co/X1Ckv1kHZq

We all want Americans to have access to nutritious food, but let's get the facts straight: the Central Valley grows healthy crops that feed the nation. Point blank. Full stop.

Stood up for our Valley producers at today's @HouseAgDems hearing. https://t.co/ss6Qeg2dc7
My full statement about my vote: https://t.co/f0pR40zkoU

The ultra-partisan budget bill gets more expensive by the day. Non-partisan CBO now says the bill will increase the deficit by $3.4 trillion and cost 10 million Americans their health care.

Exactly why I voted no. https://t.co/Gzn8Wl6UOR
Read more about the project and what this investment means for our community: https://t.co/iqULegq2OY

The Valley can't afford to compromise on water access. 

@usbr just awarded $93 million for the Sack Dam and Arroyo Canal near Dos Palos, another huge win in our efforts to secure water for Valley users while protecting wildlife. https://t.co/e5bA7H4HdR

Our bipartisan Dignity Act would overhaul immigration policy to even the playing field for hardworking, law-abiding immigrants while investing in border security—at no cost to taxpayers. Let's get this done. https://t.co/3ym4kT6OGO

This bill would grant legal protection to folks already here, modernize and invest in border security, and overhaul our asylum and visa systems to relieve the backlog. It's the transformational change our country needs. 

Read more: https://t.co/3SO5NQOO5e

Without immigrants, the Central Valley would crumble. It's beyond time to fix our broken immigration system.

That's why I'm joining a bipartisan group of my colleagues to introduce a comprehensive, historic immigration reform bill: the Dignity Act. https://t.co/74nssgjWwf
Good luck to Stan State alum Joe Ryan, who will be representing the Central Valley at tonight's MLB All-Star game! Can't wait to see him on the mound.

When disaster strikes, our farmers should not be held accountable for loss of livestock. 

That's why I joined @RepFeenstra to introduce the bipartisan Livestock Indemnity Program Improvement Act to update @USDA's payment rates and fairly compensate American farmers. https://t.co/4SKdEZhEGj

Celebrating @MercedPolice Activities League grand opening with Officer Jennifer Shaw and Councilmembers Sarah Boyle, Mike Harris and Darin DuPont! Thank you for your work to strengthen our community. https://t.co/5jPitnB17B
Read more about our bill: https://t.co/8SMZ0xCmKj

Life-saving prescription medication must be accessible to those who need it. Just introduced bipartisan legislation with @RepGregMurphy and @DrNealDunnFL2 to ensure fair reimbursement for providers and commercial accessibility for patients. https://t.co/cVLHtPTOJG
https://t.co/kucT1EQKpZ

Team Gray is rolling out across #CA13 to meet folks who need assistance with federal agencies or have questions about my work in Congress. Check out our schedule for July's Mobile Office Hours below! https://t.co/YZTJlR29t2

Our firefighters put their lives on the line every day to keep Valley families safe. That's why I'm cosponsoring bipartisan, commonsense bills to protect firefighters and support their families. https://t.co/WgONfLLKCT

The Valley lost one of our greatest this week. John Harris was the best of the best: a farmer, businessman, philanthropist and community leader. He leaves behind a rich legacy. We will truly miss him. https://t.co/4YmfuYmX4U

This hyper-partisan reconciliation bill will increase the deficit and national debt while threatening to close our rural hospitals and rob Valley families of nutrition assistance. 

For the Valley, I voted no. 

Read my full statement: https://t.co/f0pR40zSes
The Valley produces more dairy than almost any other region in the country, thanks to our hardworking farmers, producers and dairymen. Happy National Dairy Month! https://t.co/Sahj2PxR0w
It doesn’t have to be this way. Earlier this month, @HouseBlueDogs called on the majority to return to fiscal sanity. We’re still here when they want to get serious. https://t.co/ggDF6XYePX

🚌 In case you missed it: Free bus rides for the summer through Merced & Stanislaus counties! Merced’s public transit authority has routes through Los Gatos, Gustine, Turlock, Dos Palos and more. https://t.co/RJ97Kb6igf.
Read more about our letter here: https://t.co/dk5QKf9Aa3

Avian flu presents an urgent threat to Valley farms. To protect our farmers and producers, I joined @RepDavidValadao, @RepJimCosta, @RepVinceFong, and @RepJoshHarder on a bipartisan letter calling on USDA @SecRollins to take action to stop the spread. https://t.co/x4rVsgElG6

As we get closer to fire season, I’m working hard to protect the Valley from fire’s devastating impacts. @RepYoungKim and I just introduced the WRAP Act to speed up wildfire response on federal lands. More from @ABC30: https://t.co/IBpg7K5jUI
If the Valley’s farmworkers are unable to show up to work due to reckless immigration policies and fear-inducing raids, Valley ag and our economy will crumble. Couldn’t agree more with @FarmBureau.
Watch my full remarks here: https://t.co/WBMqiD3tFI

Our nation has a responsibility to provide affordable, high-quality care to our veterans. My STRIVE Act would limit copay burdens for veterans seeking care at @DeptVetAffairs to bring us closer to that goal.

More from last week’s @VetAffairsDems meeting: https://t.co/xR0v6oTFuL
Read more about our bill: https://t.co/WGqdAd00bf

Californians know how destructive wildfires can be to our communities. That’s why I joined @RepYoungKim to introduce the bipartisan Wildfire Response & Preparedness Act to establish a national 30-minute wildfire response standard. https://t.co/saQvooScl8
Our second place winner, Tian from Merced High School, will have her piece titled “A Moment of Pride” displayed in my Washington, DC office! https://t.co/YxNWPvO4s7

Congratulations to our 2025 Congressional Art Competition winner, Andrea from Modesto High School! Her piece, “California Sunshine Cow,” will represent the Valley here in the US Capitol. https://t.co/CzXMOFrWhg

Only 54 students in the country were awarded FFA scholarships this year, and one is from right here in Coalinga! Congratulations to Sammi, whose hard work paid off and made us proud. https://t.co/MY1nO5T135
My statement on yesterday's treatment of @SenAlexPadilla. https://t.co/tK04sykcHE
Read more about the Valley Water Protection Act: https://t.co/XwVX7d1HWT

Valley farmers and producers feed families across our country, and reliable water deliveries are critical to their operations. That’s why I introduced the Valley Water Protection Act to finally secure the water our farmers need. https://t.co/NnD0ST1Z0j
Watch our full exchange: https://t.co/bwqogjMlDQ

When @USDA cuts research funding, it’s not only scientists that lose. It’s our farmers and producers. 

I asked @SecRollins today what she plans to do prevent Valley farmers from falling behind our international competitors. https://t.co/RTpXZa5fwr
Learn more: https://t.co/KUw2bQNJId

For too long, red tape has increased copay costs for our veterans. That’s why I introduced a bill today to limit their copay debt accrued due to administrative errors at the VA. https://t.co/fTnGlU7jgg
June office hours just dropped! Come meet Team Gray near you this month. Visit https://t.co/J4iPm3Zvhm to learn about how we can assist you. https://t.co/95ld7JKBzQ

Our Valley is home to a vibrant, welcoming Sikh community, which is why I was honored to join my colleagues and neighbors this morning while Giani Surinder Singh offered a prayer on the House Floor. https://t.co/gxbtSRFzax

Solving California’s housing shortage will take all of us—government, stakeholders, and industry together. Thanks to the @CVARealtors for stopping by this week to talk about their work across the Valley. https://t.co/TrrAd3FU6k
This weekend is the fantastic Merced County Fair! Thank you to the hundreds of people who worked hard to bring the Fair back this year. Let the good times roll!

When I was growing up, Republicans claimed to be the party of fiscal responsibility. What happened?

I led my @HouseBlueDogs colleagues to call for a return to fiscal discipline in the reconciliation process. Read it here: https://t.co/ggDF6XXH0p https://t.co/2eOpB9IRGb
The Valley is home to one of the largest Portuguese American communities in the country. Met with Portuguese Ambassador Francisco Lopes today to talk about the friendship between our nations.

HUGE grant: Community Action Partnership in @MaderaCounty is receiving over $5 million from @HHSgov to support Head Start programs for Valley children and families. This investment in our kids is an investment in our whole community. https://t.co/DTeig5RCxf
The change the Valley needs starts with our students—the next generation of problem solvers, innovators and doers. Congratulations to all of our Valley graduates! https://t.co/mI3xFFA00w

My team and I are here to help you file requests with federal agencies. To get in touch about casework, call my district office at (209) 226-6880 or visit https://t.co/J4iPm3Zvhm. https://t.co/3GzNFEtvYM
Congratulations to Turlock High’s FFA team, who just won the state fruit tree-judging championship! The future of our Valley’s ag production and innovation is bright.

Congratulations to the Central Valley students who made it to the Scripps National Spelling Bee this week, especially Lawrence from #CA13! 

We are so proud of all you’ve accomplished. https://t.co/gBZjZMbjOq

JUST ANNOUNCED: @usbr just awarded a $255 million contract to support construction at the B.F. Sisk Dam in Los Banos. This is a huge win for Valley farmers and families. 

Read my full statement: https://t.co/gNP49Hf1hu
Thank you to everyone who joined us today to honor those who gave their lives in service to our country. https://t.co/jZa7D8RFMA

The federal government spends more on interest payments on our national debt than our entire defense budget. And the House majority just passed a bill that would add $3.8 trillion more to that debt.

It's irresponsible and it harms every American.

https://t.co/7BvjEVWOw1
My full statement: https://t.co/odnl2yTblK
This week, I voted against an ultra-partisan bill that would have ripped food assistance and health care away from hardworking Valley families. https://t.co/ID3Y8U4OR7
Memorial Day is a time to honor those who gave everything in defense of our grateful nation. Join Team Gray across the Valley this weekend to honor their sacrifice. https://t.co/zzS58pFdkt

In the middle of the night, the House majority jammed their partisan budget bill through.

Over 450,200 people in #CA13 could lose Medicaid health coverage due to these extremist policies. Shameful.

Telehealth is often the only way folks in rural areas—like the Central Valley—can see a health care provider. @RepValadao and I introduced a bill to make sure telehealth programs remain available to our communities.

Congratulations to the @MUnified Robotics Team on their third world title! Each of these students has worked countless hours to represent the Valley on the world stage. 

We’re so proud and can’t wait to see what’s next! https://t.co/exqqbLZd09

Rural communities like mine need stability and commonsense from their representatives. I’ve been disappointed to find a lack of both in my colleagues in Washington. 

We need to get serious. https://t.co/2At7dUMaty

This is a great country full of great people.

We deserve a hell of a lot better than the $230 billion in cuts to food assistance that my Agriculture Committee colleagues are proposing instead of delivering a bipartisan Farm Bill. https://t.co/3ekixOXKSm

I just introduced the bipartisan Farm Workforce Modernization Act with my colleagues to stabilize our agricultural workforce for years to come. 

Prices are already high enough—the Valley can’t afford labor shortages. https://t.co/FWVU1tdkmg
Come meet Team Gray! Our May mobile office hours are an opportunity to get help with federal agencies and learn more about community resources. https://t.co/kucT1EQKpZ https://t.co/14t6tiRHQk

ICYMI: The Natural Resources Committee met last week to pass our reconciliation proposal.

The bill had quite a few elements I didn’t like, but also had $2 billion for CA water storage. I voted in defense of Valley water.

My full remarks: https://t.co/9mZdJW9aMX https://t.co/qLINoJpnDj

NEW BILL: I just joined a bipartisan group of colleagues to introduce the Farm Workforce Modernization Act, which will streamline the visa process for farmworkers. The Valley can’t afford labor shortages. Learn more: https://t.co/EZPKEVrnT2

The Central Valley requires an all-of-the-above approach to our energy resources. In today’s Natural Resources Committee meeting, I called for hydroelectric development to power our farms and communities. https://t.co/SRjaeNlK3F

Our veterans are the very best of America—it was an honor to spend the morning with them. Thank you to all of the Central Valley veterans who came to visit us in Washington for this week’s Honor Flight. https://t.co/bqZEauRkH0 https://t.co/wDuwPzU0Xz

Thank you to the @mercedcollege Blue Devils for the workout last week! Merced College gave me my start, like many kids from the Valley, and it was great to be back on the field. https://t.co/yrbXATHFVN https://t.co/OkYgXkHnxi

The next generation of Valley ag innovators will have the opportunity to be educated right here in Merced, thanks to the new AgTec Innovation Center at @mercedcollege. Read more about our groundbreaking last week: https://t.co/k6dJdlPOGX
LAST CALL! Our Congressional Art Competition applications close next Thursday, April 24! All high school students in #CA13 are eligible to apply. More info: https://t.co/Q1gxh33rT1

Ag producers need stable markets for their operations to thrive. But they’ve become collateral damage in Washington’s reckless trade war. Read more about my bill to protect Valley farmers from tariffs in the Fresno Bee: https://t.co/KYGihjXNyF https://t.co/Z14zJNvR3W

I just introduced my first bill in Congress to protect our farmers and ag community from the impacts of reckless blanket tariffs.

My first priority will always be looking out for the Valley. Read more: https://t.co/nWtxfM7VaX https://t.co/SO836R7rdm

Reckless tariffs have already done damage to our ag economy in the Valley. It’s time for Congress to reclaim our tariff authority and make sure ag producers get a fair deal. More from @KSEE24: https://t.co/RXtmoR4waW

The majority is holding up progress on a bipartisan Farm Bill because they want to cut funding for food assistance for families, risking revenue for Valley farmers. Deeply unserious.

More from this week's @HouseAgDems hearing: https://t.co/njKEMBz6jW https://t.co/5NiKrkEcTP
Blanket tariffs on ag exports could threaten the Valley’s economy and our nation’s food supply. We have to act now to protect the ag industry—Valley farmers deserve it. https://t.co/xLPlFQvExc

Team Gray is coming to a town near you! Our April office hours are a chance to get assistance with federal agencies. We’re looking forward to seeing you. More info: https://t.co/kucT1EQKpZ https://t.co/edNeL2aSDK

Our Valley is experiencing one of the worst physician shortages in the country. That's why @RepJimCosta and I introduced a bill to provide grants to rural medical school programs like the ones at @UCMerced and @UCSFFresno. WATCH ⬇️ https://t.co/WnJX6hUD2G
Applications for our Art Competition are now open! All high school students in #CA13 are eligible to apply. Visit https://t.co/Q1gxh33rT1 for more information. https://t.co/DyNUNROUYf
Thank you to the City of Mendota for meeting with me in Washington this week. We’re a long way from home, but we’re united in our focus on the Valley. https://t.co/dw5D9hAvA1
The Valley is strongest when we work together. Thank you to our neighbors in San Joaquin, Coalinga, Firebaugh and Huron for visiting with me during our district work week! https://t.co/3dIf6Sqags

Bipartisanship isn’t dead. It’s just tough to find in Washington these days—but I won't let that stop me from finding commonsense solutions.

I joined @KMPHFOX26 to talk about my plan to tackle pressing issues with my colleagues across the aisle. https://t.co/rRk7uCZbhd

Our Valley is one of the largest dairy and poultry centers in the country. The recent rise in bird flu cases is concerning for both our producers and consumers. Washington must respond quickly—I’m hard at work with the Ag Committee to make it happen. https://t.co/nvBcaQ9qg0 https://t.co/NkCHP7PxPq

The Central Valley's ag economy requires both access to water and respect for wildlife. It's not one or the other.

Watch my remarks in today's Natural Resources hearing about how implementation of the Endangered Species Act might impact Valley farmers: https://t.co/ejDshNBhsj https://t.co/D0gkyNMaoS

Over 450,000 people in #CA13 rely on Medicaid for health coverage. But the House's proposed budget would make devastating cuts to these vital programs. Today I offered a commonsense solution to protect Medicaid for the Valley. WATCH: https://t.co/KG0Gpj1ddx https://t.co/oXXsdaybpm

For over 60 years, the Chowchilla Water District has provided dependable water to farmers in portions of Madera and Merced Counties. I’m doing everything I can in Congress to make sure they can do the same for generations to come. Thanks for having me today. https://t.co/4HLeMaEdC9
It’s #NationalAlmondDay! To the over 5,200 almond farms in my congressional district, thank you for all you do for our economy and our community! https://t.co/UhnLncaJ7N

NEWS: @ucmerced is officially an R1 research university! This proves what we already know—Merced is home to some of the most talented and hardworking students in the country. Read my full statement: https://t.co/vidgoez2NT

Farmers in the Central Valley are counting on Congress to pass a Farm Bill that supports agricultural production and development. Looking forward to working with my colleagues on the Agriculture Committee to get it done. https://t.co/3BZXZreqxr
Join Team Gray this Thursday in Merced to celebrate the start of the new Congress! Call our Turlock office to RSVP at (209) 226-6880. https://t.co/3UpEXyOazd

Red tape prevents foresters and land managers from clearing dead and dry vegetation that fuels fires. Proud to have cosponsored the bipartisan Fix Our Forests Act to protect our communities. https://t.co/Ijf7boCPG4

I recently joined several of my CA colleagues to urge President Trump to use federal resources to fight the spread of bird flu. As the largest agricultural region in the country, the San Joaquin Valley can’t afford a major outbreak. ⬇️ https://t.co/je7m5mtuG8

In case you missed it: I joined @FOX40 to talk about how I’m planning to work with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to protect and strengthen our agricultural communities. Full interview: https://t.co/VVr8MHRUIG https://t.co/PuiiwWYwQR
On Martin Luther King Jr. Day, we honor Dr. King’s lifelong efforts for liberty and justice for all Americans. https://t.co/eHXwY7sTi1

I’m proud to join the @HouseAgDems and @NRDems to ensure Central Valley farmers, dairymen and agricultural communities finally get our fair share in Washington. Read more: https://t.co/kmgF9Osz96 https://t.co/hlGzeZLfJi
